exterminator.name: Firestarter
exterminator.description: Start with Molotov and Shotgun. You deal 25% more damage during swarm attacks

exterminator.name: Pyromaniac
exterminator.description: Molotov's fire damage increased by 50%

exterminator.name: Hangover
exterminator.description: Molotovs burn 75% longer

exterminator.name: Crowd Control
exterminator.description: Push radius from melee attacks increased by 50%

exterminator.name: Minefield
exterminator.description: The maximum number of Claymores is increased by 1, but they can kill 15% fewer targets. Start with a Claymore

exterminator.name: Rage Mode
exterminator.description: When pinned down by usual or special zombies you will automatically rise up and push your attackers back (cooldown 300 seconds)

exterminator.name: All Elbows
exterminator.description: Movement speed penalty when zombies are very close reduced by 100%

exterminator.name: Rooted
exterminator.description: You can never be pinned down by usual zombies (does not affect special zombies)

exterminator.name: Stop, drop, and roll
exterminator.description: When you become incapacitated, you ignite enemies around you

exterminator.name: Dragon Hide
exterminator.description: Fire resistance increased by 100%

exterminator.name: Heavy Metal
exterminator.description: Start with improved RPGL4 that deals 100% more damage. All RPGL4 pickups for you also improved

exterminator.name: Heavy Metal II
exterminator.description: Start with improved Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun that deals 25% more damage, and has 25% more ammo. All Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun pickups for you also improved

exterminator.name: Big Bang
exterminator.description: Start with an improved Multi-shot Rocket Launcher that kills 50% more zombies. All MRL202 Commando pickups for you are also improved

exterminator.name: Bandolier
exterminator.description: Mortar and Stationary machinegun ammo capacity increased by 25% for all team. Durability of defenses increased by 25% for all team

exterminator.name: Deep Pockets
exterminator.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Wheatgrass
exterminator.description: Health increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Rifleman
exterminator.description: Start with ARK-103 Assault Rifle

exterminator.name: S890
exterminator.description: Start with an S890 Combat Shotgun

exterminator.name: Green Fingered
exterminator.description: Your Claymores are rigged to explode only when there are at least 5 targets in the blast area. Start with Claymore

exterminator.name: Fire Trap
exterminator.description: Claymore explosions set fire to surrounding area. Start with Claymore

exterminator.name: Combat Engineer
exterminator.description: 20% chance to restore an expended Defense Kit. (10% for Horde Mode)

exterminator.name: Burnout
exterminator.description: During swarm attacks, fire damage is increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Second Wind
exterminator.description: Instead of becoming incapacitated you will regain 25% health and keep going (cooldown 120 seconds)

exterminator.name: Job Satisfaction
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

exterminator.name: Cloak and Dagger
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants masking effect for 3 seconds

exterminator.name: Heavy bone
exterminator.description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop an MRL202 Commando (cooldown: 120 seconds)

exterminator.name: Hollywood II
exterminator.description: Explosives and fire damage dealt to yourself and your teammates reduced by 50%

exterminator.name: Broad Shoulders
exterminator.description: Heavy weapon ammo capacity increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Bullet Rain
exterminator.description: All fully automatic weapons' reload speed increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Third Hand
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

exterminator.name: Nimble fingers
exterminator.description: Shotgun reload speed is increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Party at my Place
exterminator.description: Maximum Molotov capacity increased to 3 and Claymore capacity to 4

exterminator.name: Pickpocket
exterminator.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

exterminator.name: Pocket Factory
exterminator.description: You won't be able to pick equipment bags on the mission but your equipment will be constantly regenerating (150 seconds to replenish to maximum)

exterminator.name: Impromptu
exterminator.description: Special zombies are stunned by the Molotov's splash

exterminator.name: Know-How
exterminator.description: Molotovs and Claymores can kill 25% more targets

exterminator.name: Hot Sauce
exterminator.description: Molotov's splash damage increased by 100%

exterminator.name: Ghost
exterminator.description: Automatically receive masking effect if you are the last of your team still standing (does not apply if you are incapacitated or pinned)

exterminator.name: Heavy stride
exterminator.description: Claymore mines explode twice with a delay of 5 seconds, but each explosion can kill 15% fewer targets. Start with a Claymore

exterminator.name: Daredevil
exterminator.description: When there are more than 30 zombies in the area, firearm damage is increased by 25% and number of melee strikes before becoming fatigued increased by 2

exterminator.name: Wheatgrass II
exterminator.description: Health increased by 5%

exterminator.name: Bullet Rain II
exterminator.description: Shotgun and semi automatic weapons reload speed increased by 10%

exterminator.name: Know-How II
exterminator.description: Molotovs and Claymores can kill 10% more targets

exterminator.name: Deep Pockets II
exterminator.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary weapons increased by 10%

exterminator.name: Dragon Hide II
exterminator.description: Fire resistance for you and your team is increased by 10%

exterminator.name: Roseship
exterminator.description: Barbed wire can kill 10% more targets for the whole team

exterminator.name: Oily hands
exterminator.description: Molotov throw distance is increased by 25%

exterminator.name: Bandolier II
exterminator.description: All defense kits you install can kill 10% more targets and have 10% more ammo capacity
